attributes.action: Stop euthanizing innocent dogs, unless they attack people or other dogs.
attributes.background: Many staffies and pitbulls are put down each year because they are deemed dangerous due to the way they are trained & the way they look.It's not fair to the dogs, or their owners. There are many other dangerous dogs in this world that we still allow in this country. Discrimination on looks is wrong.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, your petition could ask Parliament to make a specific change to the law on dangerous dogs.
